title: Buzz Bissinger: With Caitlyn Jenner, 'You Feel A Connection'
teaser: NPR's Melissa Block interviews Buzz Bissinger about his profile of Caitlyn Jenner in Vanity Fair and her gender transition. She is formerly known as Bruce, an Olympic gold medalist in the decathlon.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
